openerSection: Issued by the Punjab National Bank, the PNB RuPay Platinum Credit Card is aimed at providing its customers with various reward offers and other benefits. With a joining fee of Rs. 500, the card gets you 300 Reward Points on your card's first swipe as a welcome gift. You get 1 Reward Point on every Rs. 100 you spend using this card, and 50 extra Reward Points on registering for the E-bill facility. To provide you with extra-luxurious travel experiences, the card provides complimentary lounge access to domestic as well as international airport lounges.

The card has a nominal annual fee of Rs. 500, which can be waived off just by making one transaction every quarter. The Union Bank also offers Platinum Credit Card on the RuPay network, which is quite similar to this card offered by PNB. The other benefits of the PNB RuPy Platinum card include fuel surcharge waiver, accidental insurance cover, etc. Keep reading the information given below to know all about the PNB RuPay Platinum Credit Card and its advantages:
andThereIsMore: You get 1 Reward Point for every retail spend of Rs. 100 using your PNB RuPay Platinum Credit Card.
Zero liability against a lost card.

rewardsPoints: You get 1 Reward Point for every retail spend of Rs. 100 using your PNB RuPay Platinum Credit Card.

Reward Redemption: You can redeem your earned Reward Points by logging in to the PNB Rewardz website. 1 Reward Point = Rs. 0.50.
Travel: Complimentary airport lounge access every year
Domestic Lounge Access: Up to 2 complimentary domestic lounge access every quarter
International Lounge Access: Up to 2 complimentary international lounge access every quarter
Insurance Benefits: Insurance cover for the personal accident is provided
Zero Liability Protection: The cardholder will not be liable for any unauthorized transactions made on the card once the loss is reported to the bank through the 24*7 helpline number.

Spend based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off if the PNB RuPay Platinum Credit card is used once every quarter.
Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge is waived off for all fuel transactions between Rs. 500 and Rs. 3,000.
Cash Advance Charge: 2% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 100 (whichever is higher) at PNB ATMs. 2% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 150 (whichever is higher) at Other ATMs. 2% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 250 (whichever is higher) at Overseas
